Name: Columbia River
Comments: U-Pb. Time range includes 95% of volume

Name: Caribbean-Colombian
Comments: May not be a real LIP, just new crust

Name: HALIP (High Arctic LIP)
Volume range [km3]: Dikes span 2E6 km2 area, largely unknown eruptive depth

Name: CAMP
Location(s): North America, South America, Africa, Europe (Iberia)

Name: Emeishan
Volume range [km3]: 3E5 km3 original est; 1.76E6 - 3.2E6 est from mafic underplate, addt'l 3E4 km felsics

Name: Baltica- Kola Pen. (Kola-Dneiper)
Volume range [km3]: Spans 3E6 km2 area but depth unknown

Name: Kalkarindji (sills)
Volume range [km3]: Spans  2.1E6 km2 area, but depth unknown. Minimum 500,000 (Glass and Phillips 2006)

Name: Central Iapetus- Sept Iles, Catoctin, Volyn
